name: issue_tracking
description: Tracks the number of issues, who created them, and their open status.

dimensions.name: number
dimensions.description: The unique number identifying the issue.

dimensions.name: author__login
dimensions.description: The login of the user who created the issue.

dimensions.name: created_at
dimensions.description: The timestamp when the issue was created.

dimensions.name: closed
dimensions.description: Indicates whether the issue is closed.

measures.name: open_issue_count
measures.expr: SUM(CASE WHEN closed = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

measures.name: average_closure_time
measures.description: The average time it takes for an issue to be closed.

sample_questions: How many open issues are there?
Which user has created the most issues so far?
How long does it take on average for an issue to be closed?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT number, author__login, created_at, closed, closed_at, title, url FROM issues.issues
